quest.name: Calling All Adventurers
journal: Philestiaux is carefully inspecting the structure before him.

dialogue.name: PHILESTIAUX
dialogue.text: Well, if it isn't the savior of Ishgard! 'Tis an honor and a pleasure indeed to be graced with your presence. As it just so happens, there was a matter regarding which I was hoping to consult with an esteemed adventurer such as yourself.

dialogue.name: PHILESTIAUX
dialogue.text: ...Ah, but I forget my manners. I am called Philestiaux, and Lord Francel has tasked me with overseeing the paperwork for new residents here in the Firmament.

dialogue.name: PHILESTIAUX
dialogue.text: Thanks in no small part due to your selfless efforts on our behalf, countless adventurers, tradesmen, and laborers from across Eorzea have chosen to make this place their home. And now that the Hoarfrost has been completed, we finally have a place to put them all.

dialogue.name: PHILESTIAUX
dialogue.text: There is, however, just one rub. We have─at least thus far─lacked a facility to serve the role of the Adventurers' Guilds that one might find in other nations─a role which will become increasingly vital as our population continues to grow.

dialogue.name: PHILESTIAUX
dialogue.text: And so, I have decided to devote this building we stand before to that very purpose. Unfortunately─and I am rather embarrassed to admit this─I am not entirely clear on precisely what manner of business is conducted at these guilds, and in turn, what sort of structure might best serve that purpose.

dialogue.name: PHILESTIAUX
dialogue.text: Pray enlighten me, friend. What would you say is the defining characteristic of an active, successful Adventurers' Guild?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: A place where adventurers can come to each other's aid.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: A place where citizens in need can enlist adventurers' services.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: It wouldn't hurt to have a tavern.

dialogue.name: PHILESTIAUX
dialogue.text: ...I see. I have heard that in other nations, veteran types known as “mentors” oft lend their wisdom and expertise to fledgling adventurers in need. No doubt having a venue to encourage such sharing of knowledge and mutual support can only be of benefit to the community.

dialogue.name: PHILESTIAUX
dialogue.text: Ah, so that is the primary purpose of an Adventurers' Guild! If adventurers are to render assistance efficiently and swiftly, it certainly stands to reason that there needs to be a dedicated venue where they may receive petitions from townsfolk.

dialogue.name: PHILESTIAUX
dialogue.text: Now that you mention it, I imagine that adventuring must be strenuous and demanding work indeed. It stands to reason that your hardworking peers would welcome a place where they can relax and enjoy fine company and conversation over a bottle of Ishgardian brandy.

dialogue.name: PHILESTIAUX
dialogue.text: Thank you, my friend. The insight you have shared with me will no doubt prove invaluable in transforming this venue into one that will serve all adventurers in the Firmament, and make them feel at home.

dialogue.name: PHILESTIAUX
dialogue.text: If I could impose upon you just one last time, might you be willing to speak to some of your peers here in the Firmament, and see if you could find a generous soul or two who would be willing to stop by? After all, an Adventurers' Guild without adventurers is hardly worthy of the name.

dialogue.name: PHILESTIAUX
dialogue.text: Many thanks, my friend! I have no doubt that as the savior of Ishgard and a fellow adventurer, your words will resonate with them far more than mine ever could.

dialogue.name: PHILESTIAUX
dialogue.text: Have you perchance been able to recruit any of your fellow adventurers to aid in the establishment of our new Adventurers' Guild? Please, my friend, you are my best hope!

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERD03962
dialogue.text: If it isn't Forename! Always a pleasure to see you, my friend. What brings you to the Firmament today?

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERD03962
dialogue.text: They mean to build an Adventurers' Guild here in Featherfall, you say? I do believe I speak for everyone when I say this is a most welcome development, indeed.

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERD03962
dialogue.text: After all, it has been rather tedious going from door to door every day, asking the townspeople if they had any tasks requiring an adventurer's expertise. If there is anything I can do to see that the new facility is a rousing success, I am more than happy to do it.

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERE03962
dialogue.text: Hm? Is there something you need from me?

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERE03962
dialogue.text: A new Adventurers' Guild, eh? I've only just arrived from Ul'dah, and am still learning the lay of the land. I'm not embarrassed to admit I was hoping there might be a place where I could meet some veteran types and learn a thing or two. Color me interested!

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERF03962
dialogue.text: Need assistance with something, friend? In that case, I would encourage you to consult with one of my colleagues. I fear I'm but an apprentice here, and would have little to offer you...

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERF03962
dialogue.text: What's that you say? A new gathering place will be opening here in the Firmament!? Why, this is wonderful news indeed!

dialogue.name: HWDADVENTURERF03962
dialogue.text: I relocated here from Limsa to learn a new trade, but I must admit that I find myself feeling a touch homesick at times. I was hoping there might be a place where I could mingle with travelers and hear the latest tales and tidings from my homeland. I must visit it at once!

dialogue.name: PHILESTIAUX
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are, friend! I'm pleased to inform you that a number of your peers have already graced us with their presence. Why, this place is starting to feel more and more like an honest-to-goodness Adventurers' Guild with every moment!

dialogue.name: PHILESTIAUX
dialogue.text: Rest assured that I will do everything in my power to see that this place flourishes into a home away from home for all adventurers who pay visit to the Holy See.

dialogue.name: PHILESTIAUX
dialogue.text: Pray forgive me for imposing upon the esteemed savior of Ishgard with such a trivial task, but you have done us a great service today, and for that you have my most sincere gratitude. Whenever you are inclined to grace us with your presence, our doors will always be open.
